alert.note: Alert for Dane; Dodge; Jefferson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 4:48PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Dane, northwestern Jefferson and southwestern Dodge Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 447 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Deerfield, or near Lake Mills, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Watertown, Lake Mills, Marshall, Waterloo, Juneau, Deerfield, Cambridge, Hustisford, Lake Ripley, Milford, Reeseville, Richwood, Clyman, Lowell, Hubbleton, and Danville. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 151 near mile marker 125. Interstate 94 between mile markers 249 and 264. Wisconsin Highway 26 between mile markers 40 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for south central and southeastern Wisconsin.
